devdoc.details: ERC20 token. Its inside value is collatral pool net worth.

addMinerBalance(address,uint256).details: Interface to manager FNX mine pool contract, add miner balance when user has bought some options.

params.amount: user's pay for buying options, priced in USD.

addlockBalance(address,uint256,uint256).details: Move user's FPT to locked balance, when user redeem collateral.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

burn(address,uint256).details: burn user's FPT when user redeem FPTCoin.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller.     * This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

getItemTimeLimitation(uint256).details: Retrieve user's start time for burning.

getLockedBalance(address).details: Retrieve user's locked balance and locked net worth.

getUserBurnTimeLimite(address).details: Retrieve user's start time for burning.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller.     * This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

initialize().details: constructor function. set FNX minePool contract address.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

mint(address,uint256).details: mint user's FPT when user add collateral.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeemLockedCollateral(address,uint256,u.details: An interface of redeem locked FPT, when user redeem collateral, only manager contract can invoke.

params.leftCollateral: left available collateral in collateral pool, priced in USD.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTimeLimitation(uint256).details: set time limitation, only owner can invoke.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Move user's FPT to 'recipient' balance, a interface in ERC20.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Move sender's FPT to 'recipient' balance, a interface in ERC20.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: FPTCoin is finnexus collateral Pool token, implement ERC20 interface.
